Articles.Content:
I'm planning a Sarnus mission from OPM, and I can't figure out the dV needed for Tekto and Slate ascent. Any help..?

Edited March 23, 2015 by Yukon0009

Add the Delta-V numbers as you follow the trail to the planet you please(and add the numbers again as you trail back to Kerbin if you intend to return) to know the ammount of dV you will need.

Edited March 23, 2015 by Commissioner Tadpole

Just FYI, I just updated the map to rise Priax low orbit altitude from 35 km to 45 km because 35 was too low and your ship would eventually crash (or seen as crashed by KSP under high time warp, not sure).

Also, keep in mind that land/take off dV are calculated considering the radius at the equator, you probably will land on a higher spot and depending on the body the difference might be quite high, so lower dV needed.

Also note the "WIP" seal down to the right. Don't blame me if you strand your kerbals.
